author: Ben Brown
title: Dow Jones on Edge as Tense China Diplomacy Nears Breaking Point
description:
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo accuses China of covering up the coronavirus outbreak and stokes rumours of Wuhan lab involvement.

content:
• Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) futures turned negative on Thursday, pointing to a weak open on Wall Street.
